comment.realname: lifeasdaddy ...a guy, his wife, and their son...
comment.author: 13267298@N00
comment._content: He lived in the USA for many years. He was also at one time appointed by Persia to be Consul General at New York. [ query.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=F70610FA385B17738... ] His wife was the former Miss Florence Breed of Boston.

comment.author: 70251312@N00
